summary:
I hold a Bachelor Degree in Technical Journalism from the University of Applied Sciences in Nuremberg and graduated with a Master Degree in Industrial Economics from Universidad Carlos III de Madrid. 

I would describe me as an organised, curious and targeted goal driven person with an international mindset. Fluent in German, English and Spanish I also bring a lot of international experience by living abroad in New Zealand, Sweden or Spain which helps me to adapt working in a diversified and multicultural environment.

Personal Interest in solutions that drive innovation and success for customers but also having a positive impact on people.

I define success of failing, hungry to learn and never stop questioning as my key drivers to achieve results personally but also in the team.

awards.title: Scholarship/ Deutschlandstipendium
awards.description:
The Deutschlandstipendium provides financial and non-material support to high-achieving and committed students from all over the world. Modelled after the principle of public-private partnership, businesses, foundations or private individuals sponsor young talent with a pledge of 150 euros per month. The Federal Government matches this amount with another 150 euros. But there is even more: Many universities and private sponsors also support Deutschlandstipendium holders through concurrent mentoring programmes, networking events and internships.
http://www.deutschlandstipendium.de

profile_positions.description:
Lucid is a visual collaboration suite that helps teams see and build the future. Virtual whiteboarding, intelligent diagramming, and cloud visualization come together to empower organizations to take plans from initial ideas all the way to successful delivery. Together, they are utilized in over 180 countries by more than 25 million users. Ninety-six percent of the Fortune 500 use Lucidchart, and customers include Google, GE, NBC Universal and Johnson & Johnson. Lucid’s partners include industry leaders such as Google, Atlassian, Amazon Web Services, Salesforce, and Microsoft. Since the Utah-based company’s founding in 2010, it has received numerous awards for its business and workplace culture.

Highest Monthly Performance 74 SQO (Sales Qualified Opportunities)
Sales Quota Attainment Q3 2020: 141%
Sales Quota Attainment Q4 2020: 145%

profile_positions.description:
Signify (Euronext: LIGHT) is the world leader in lighting for professionals and consumers and lighting for the Internet of Things. Our Philips products, Interact connected lighting systems and data-enabled services, deliver business value and transform life in homes, buildings and public spaces. With 2019 sales of EUR 6.2 billion, we have approximately 32,000 employees and are present in over 70 countries. We unlock the extraordinary potential of light for brighter lives and a better world. We have been named Industry Leader in the Dow Jones Sustainability Index for three years in a row.

profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Bachelor thesis at the department "Zentralfunktionen Produktion". (Supervised by AUDI AG and University of Applied Science Nuremberg, Department Mathematics, Physics and General Studies)

Title: Development of a target group-specific communication methodology for the innovation process and the knowledge transfer of basic technologies of the Smart Factory at AUDI AG. (1.3 German Grading Scheme)

Abstract
The automotive industry is currently in the middle of digital transformation and strongly influenced by innovations and megatrends and, furthermore faces drastic changes in terms of human and technical requirements. For a long time already, innovative ability and innovation culture have been regarded as success factors for companies. With innovation communication represending an interdisciplinary form of corporate communication, innovation management processes can be accompanied and supported strategically and target group-specifically right from the beginning. Methods such as gamification provide new possibilities for the transfer of knowledge and transparent dissemination of highly complex and sensitive topics of digitalization. This work examines the field and the importance of innovation communication and gamification as success factors for the innovation management process. For this purpose, action recommendations for target group-specific communication methods for the innovation process and the knowledge transfer of basic technologies are considered in greater detail at AUDI AG.
profile_positions.title: Bachelor Thesis

Applying critical thought to the status quo, they bring unique and innovative ideas to fruition. Their vision: Inspire through individual, sustainable premium mobility. In a work atmosphere of creative freedom the seemingly distant future is already taking shape.

profile_positions.description:
The research project Media Frames and Industry 4.0 is about the influence by media regarding the success of technologies like Industrie 4.0 and should analyze which metaphers are used in certain context? The research project focuses on this question. Acceptance of technologies - stakeholder constellations and frames in the Industrie 4.0 discussion.

- Support of project Management and project implementation
- Collaborate data ascertainment research content
- Take over inquiry work concerning the research project

Further details about the research project under the direction of Professor Volker M. Banholzer: http://www.th-nuernberg.de/seitenbaum/fakultaeten/angewandte-mathematik-physik-und-allgemeinwissenschaften/studiengang-b-tj/aktuelles/page.html
